website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour SpeedForm Gemini 2 offers a great update as a neutral shoe. It gives runners added cushioning, stability and support. Some users found the performance of the shoe impressive but there are also a few who are unhappy with the shoe’s fit. In summary, the shoe is average and is ideal for road running and daily training.
pros: The Under Armour SpeedForm Gemini 2 has perforated upper that users agree gives maximum breathability
The shoe's molded toe cap visibly adds durability and support, as observed by wearers
Most runners liked the embedded sockliner because it gives added cushioning, comfort and keeps foot free from moisture
A significant number of users mentioned that the dual-layer midsole delivers responsiveness and cushioned support
The anatomical flex grooves promote maximum heel-to-toe transition for a smooth ride
The various color options of the shoe are appreciated by many
cons: The SpeedForm Gemini 2 is slightly expensive
The shoe is too narrow and tight for some runners

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shoes!! I will not buy any other running shoes. So I have flat feet which Im sure like others causes pain in my feet, back, shines, etc. If I wear the wrong shoes. I run a lot so it's crucial I have the best shoes which some believe will cost a lot i.e. $200. From just trying them on when they arrived I knew they were awesome. I tried them out at first on the treadmill and then took them out on the road for the full test. Feels so good running in these as they fit perfectly. I will definitely be buying again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: My New Go-To Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: As a runner I've worn various models of just about every running shoe manufacturer out there. These are my second pair of Gemini's, I can't tell much of a difference between the 2's vs. the Gemini 1's other than some slight cosmetic changes but I can tell you this: not only are they the best looking running shoes I've ever worn (Steel/Fuel Green/Anthracite), they are also the most comfortable, lightest, well-cushioned, supportive and smoothest running shoe I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers are the best I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are the best I have ever worn.I'm not a runner but very active and work on a concrete surface all day 6-7 days a week.i average about 6-12 miles per as per my fitbit for whatever thats worth and these sneakers made a huge improvement over how my feet and legs felt at the end of the day.I have 4 pair of gemini 2 and one pair of gemini and this pait of gemini 2.1.I love them all...They do fit aprox 1/2 size too small fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe in every respect.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, my second pair of UA Speedform Genimi's. My first pair was Gen 1 and I loved them, too. They are super lightweight, super soft uppers so that you feel like you're wearing a pair of socks only. And the sole is very soft and absorbs impact, so that even after walking around all day in these shoes, my feet feel fine. They also fit my narrow foot whereas most shoes are too wide. Perfect shoe for me. They look great too in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Impressive fit, amazing padding, and now my favorite pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few of the reviews, I was doubtful that I was going to like these shoes. I've been wearing UA running shoes for years, so I had a lot of confidence in the build and fit, so I ordered with the highest of hopes. I knew as soon as I put these on I was going to love them, and I was right! These fit my feet perfectly, and the padding is spot on perfect. My calves felt great after the first run! I'll be buying a few more pair of these real soon.
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I was excited at the idea of having a pair of sneakers that fit comfortably and like a sock. I was very happy to see how comfortable they actually are. The light-weight material feels great while working out and my feet don't tire as much as they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J. Majcher

customer_reviews.title: I have a pair of these shoes and I love them. However
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these shoes and I love them. However, I bought these and they are definitely NOT a women’s 8.5. They are a men’s shoe. They are two inches bigger than my other pair. I will get a pair in department store next time. Huge let down.
customer_reviews.author: JStep

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good shoe. I used to wear asics
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good shoe. I used to wear asics, but got tired of the tongue always slipping out of place. Under armour shoe fits as expected. At times though I feel some slight bruising around the heel , but this is when I first got the shoe. This has eventually gone away. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: newcomer18

customer_reviews.title: Like them but don't love them
customer_reviews.text: These run small, I wear 11, need a size 12 in these. So these are good shoes, light, comfortable, stretchable and breathable. I don't like where the edge of the back hits between my heel and my achilles tendon, it just feels weird. I have almost the same pair but Gemini 2 (not 2.1) that I wore out completely and they seemed better, lighter, smaller, better looking, more comfortable, etc. I like the 2.1s but I don't love them like I loved the 2s. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Perpetually Circumambulating

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love sneakers, I wear them everywhere. These are one of the best, lightweight with excellent support, they also last... Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Come to Papa

customer_reviews.title: What i really like about these shoes were they way the slipped on
customer_reviews.text: What i really like about these shoes were they way the slipped on, super comfortable, easy to put on , breathable and light. Size was a bit smaller than another pair of shoes i ordered but other than that they are great. Use them for the gym quite a bit and they have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Luz O.

customer_reviews.title: Best UA Walking/running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Way to go UA the best walking shoe I have ever owned! They look amazing too!!! I've been experiencing some shin/splint problems and I walked last night pain-free!!! I believe in reading reviews on products and I have no disappointments with this product!!! Yessss!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Kiddy

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not at all accurate! Defective/rejects trying to be sold here on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Ordered another pair to have because we loved the ones we purchased from The Under Armour store itself. These seem to be defective shoes because we ordered the same size we have and they are definitely NOT the same or even close. We came here to purchase because the UA store no longer has them. These we purchase here on Amazon have been returned. Exercise caution order these off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great.  Just bought my second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I run between 40-50 miles a week and use these shoes for all types of runs: long, recovery, and speed workouts. They work great for me. Cushioning is just enough... not too soft.. not too firm. I really like the heel counter and the lack of insole. I run sock-less in this shoe all the time, and it is perfect for that. No blisters even on 15+ milers. I don't have the sizing issue reported by others. I'm typically a 12 in most brands, and these are no different for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The shoe for walking or standing all day
customer_reviews.text: This is an all day shoe for anyone walking on concrete or on their feet a lot. Comfortable, light weight and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: J Ingram

customer_reviews.title: UA Gemini 2 is perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour Gemini 2 is the most amazing shoe I have ever put on in my life! I have had every expensive Nike, Brooks, Asics etc and Under Armour puts everyone of them to shame! So comfortable! You can't go wrong with anything UA !!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is one thing that makes me mad about these shoes. That one day they won’t make them anymore. These are my second pair. Only reason I had to buy a new pair is that I ripped a hole in them. Other than that they were still super comfy. I’m a liquor delivery man and they held up awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Crazee

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color in shoe image for Black and gold.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of these shoes that I have purchased. They are super comfortable. I don't wear them for running, so I can't speak to their running performance. They feel like wearing socks, they really are very comfy. The main reason for the review, is that the photo for the black and gold color is wrong. The photo shows Navy and gold, the shoes that I received were Black with more of a Yellow accent. Not a huge deal, just beware if you think you will get the color in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riecks

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is awesome, it is very comfortable and a good running ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is awesome, it is very comfortable and a good running shoe. It has features that I look for in a running shoe, such as not too light weight, yet not heavy. The toe space is just right, the sole cushioning is great and the bluetooth feature is a great added feature. I hope UA continue to make, create and update this shoe, because when it's time to purchase a new pair, I will.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Picture not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. However the picture for forest green/white is NOT what you get. The picture appears to show black with green trim and striped shoe laces. What you get is a completely dark green shoe with matching green shoe laces. Sadly will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, very comfortable. I read about the half size issue, 12’s weren’t available so I went with 12.5 and the fit is spot on. No color issues looked the same as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Teeee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most comfortable shoe I have worn. Has a very comfortable fit around ankle and soft sole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I own.
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and the fit. I wear them everywhere. They look good and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R Fuss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quality- NOT NIKE
customer_reviews.text: Second time I have purchased this shoe. First pair bought in store and then had to order from Amazon to find it again. Best most comfortable shoe I’ve had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This s*** was seriously lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight shoe. I was a little concerned with the heel rubbing however that's not a problem. I got the orange and blue ones and they work just fine for walking around

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Use for everyday wear and select gym time-shoe fits snug and comfortable for walking. I’m 240 lbs is not sure I would recommend for running (support)- Overall good looking pair of UA.

customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great however when I opened the amd tried the shoes on the right shoe felt different when I checked sizes the left shoe is a size 11 and the right shoe is a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Baltazar T. Perez

customer_reviews.title: By far the best running/walking/everyday shoe I've every owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the best running/walking/everyday shoe I've every owned! This is my second pair. Have a friend & we both bought these shoes on the same day. She has custom inserts for her shoes. After purchasing these, she doesn't need them in these shoes. She's on her second or third pair. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Parker

customer_reviews.title: UA rocks.
customer_reviews.text: The only running shoes for me. Comfortable, light weight with good support and style. Consistent fit, shoe to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Went a half size bigger after reading some reviews that they ran a bit small. Glad I did cause they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: 3/5 Stars! (caution)
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are a 5/5 However, the right shoe's "midsole" was very poorly constructed to the point where as I was walking I happened to bend my right foot. I tripped too the point where I felt as my right ankle was gonna snap, to say the least. Other than that I would have re-bought these shoes. But never again. I guess I'll have to seek other UA shoes after these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Z 123

customer_reviews.title: Thumbnails are very misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The thumbnails for the colors are extremely misleading, be sure to read the description of the shoe for the actual color. The black shoe with green trim is actually solid dark green. Looks nothing like it!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It's a very comfortable show! I've been a Nike, Rebok, and NB buyer for years. Hopefully this shoe will keep up with my active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I read the reviews about them running a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the shoes. I’m glad I read the reviews about them running a half size too small. Ordered him a half size up and they fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived in yellow and black and weren’t at all as pictured.

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as a different color!
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering the shoes in the picture for the colors of them. When I received them, they are just dark green. I thought I just ordered them wrong, so I looked back at my order and the order shows the grey and teal shoes. Why did I receive dark green? I would have gotten the orange and black had I known they were green. The picture is what I got. If you look at the picture on the order they are completely different.
customer_reviews.author: michelle oatney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes my husband will wear now that doesn't hurt his planters fasciaitis

customer_reviews.text: The photo was different from product I received. Not happy about the false add.

customer_reviews.title: These are my absolute favorite sneakers ever
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite sneakers ever! I have at least 3 pair in various colors. Feels like a slipper, but great support for walking, biking, any activity really. So comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: wendy2334

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: UA runs a bit small and normally wear a size 10. The 10.5 fits great! Great support, awesome for everyday, and is very breathable. Will defiantly try and buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: John A Seger Sr

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! They are super comfy and durable thus ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! They are super comfy and durable thus far! I run, crossfit and strength train in these are perfect. I would certainly recommend for runners. When these wear out , I will be purchasing them again and again!! My favorite pair of tennis shoes thus far!

customer_reviews.title: If you have flat feet, you must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and fits as expected. I have flat feet and hammer toes so running is usually uncomfortable at distances greater than 2.5 miles. Ran 3 miles in them and did not get the normal pains I would get in my legs from my toes wanting to curl more.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I have been wearing them daily The only thing that might be a downside is the shoelace eyelets might not be as strong as the speedform shoes that I had previously. Time will tell I’ll update soon
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good until I put the right one on
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good until I put the right one on. It had a defect under the right big toe that wasn't close to tolerable. Had to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, comfortable, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The foot bed of this shoe is so very comfortable! Not to mention, I got this shoe at a great value. I absolutely love this shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Previously worn.
customer_reviews.text: I love this gym shoe line, however, when my "new" pair arrived, they had been previously worn. I was very disappointed and requested a refund.

customer_reviews.title: 60 miles and counting... Overall very good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I knew this are half a size small, so I purchased 10.5 when I always get 10 in other brands. They are very good for long runs.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great, Not Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Truly fits like a glove, super comfortable. However, I would not recommend it if you are running trails, as it is not at all water resistant.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my 7 y/o excellent athletic shoes they last.

customer_reviews.text: fit is great however the rubber/sole is a bit stiff unlike the prior version but still comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I own 3 pair in multiple colors... and these team colors are my favorite.

customer_reviews.title: That is a very good thing. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them. That is a very good thing. Thank you.

customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, got many compliments and they were very comfortable in a long day at amusement park.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent running shoe but it fits somewhat small so order a half size bigger. If they do not have any half size bigger than your regular size, a full size bigger wouldn't be too big for you especially if you will be wearing socks. Besides that, it's extremely comfortable. Great cushioning technology.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but Decent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The description of the item stated black, but I received red. Aside from that, after receiving the correct color, they are decent shoes. They are very comfortable, and they don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: I would to give these shoes five stars but I found that they stated to wear down a lot faster than most of my running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great running shoes they fit great feel better than great and has all the support I need

customer_reviews.title: which makes it difficult to find a secure fit without feeling like you're cutting circulation off to your foot
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is how they lace up. They're very elastic and stretchy, which makes it difficult to find a secure fit without feeling like you're cutting circulation off to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Me, this guy.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and price was great! I usually buy women but found the men's cheaper and just as good. Fast delivery too!

customer_reviews.text: Gave me blisters - will not be purchasing it again. But most likely feet are not compatible with this brand.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had these for 10 minutes! got them sent to my Job & put them on ASAP.. most comfortable shoes ever! So glad I was able to find them, these shoes are so hard to find

customer_reviews.title: It is a Christmas gift for my son. Will ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift for my son. Will see if they fit when he opens them up. If they don’t fit I will return for a size 10 instead of the 10 1-2 shoes.. thanks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance between comfort and structure
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I have ever had. Perfect balance between comfort and structure. The embedded chip and app are really useful in tracking Run stats.

customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid shoe lover. This is the best pair I've ever owned. I now have 3 pair!

customer_reviews.text: Love them, fit great, look great, excellent quality at excellent price

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 pair !
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I ever had. Over the last year I've bought four pair at different places, was glad to find these. Great price too!

customer_reviews.title: Feel like they were made for me
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! Extremely comfortable. Fit is very similar to the previous Gemini. I always get an 8.5 in UA shoes and I wear an 8 in standard non-athletic shoes for reference.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Arrival and Accurate Described
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are the best of the line... Gemini 1 had flaws and 3 is ugly as sin and are not good for running. These are the best in the line.

customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. Make sure to go at least a half size up if you plan on going long distance.

customer_reviews.text: Love them very comfortable. Wish they had a little more protection around the toes

customer_reviews.text: Ordered exact same shoe size etc of gemini I bought 1-2 years previous These were too big. Concerned they were knock offs because of the size discrepancy.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Go up a 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.text: The design and comfort of the shoe is great. However, it runs a bit small for me.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and eye catching looks
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shoe made in Vietnam but the materials came from the USA. Good quality and nice looking. Good job under armour!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it fits as described So Comfy and so light

customer_reviews.text: I really liked the support and cushioning of shoes but they gave me blisters even when wearing athletic socks.

customer_reviews.text: Love this version...2.1. More comfortable than any of the newer versions. Great fit and color.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I must admit these are some of the best show I have purchased and I love them.

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It is so comfortable and has to be the best running shoe I ever purchased since I began running several years ago. There is plenty of arch support and well cushioned in the heel of the shoe.

customer_reviews.text: fit great but they are closer to orange than red which is what I wanted

customer_reviews.text: extreme lightweight. Top of shoe is stretch fitting feels like a slipper. Narrow fit. Runs a size smaller than Assics style athletic shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time, arrived fast .. Thank you

customer_reviews.text: If you're a 10.5 or 11, go with the 10.5..shoe box is a little wide...

customer_reviews.text: True to size and extra comfort for people with feet issues. This is my husbands third pair. No other shoe compares.

customer_reviews.text: Blew all my expectations out of the water!!! Best running shoe I've ever owned!!!! Construction, comfort, durability, performance through different types of training. And oohhhh yea... they look dope too

customer_reviews.text: These are for my husband for Father's day but he has worn this type of shoe and loves them.

customer_reviews.text: At the top it has a yellow stripe, at the bottom the sole is yellow and not black as in the picture on the amazon and the gold became YELLOW

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes and give great support for your legs/feet
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at these shoes. I have been wearing Asics gel kayano shoes for 6 years and wanted to try something more cost effective. I love the support of these and the overall feel.

customer_reviews.text: Lightest running shoes and most comfortable shoes I have worn

product_meta.title: Under Armour Ua Speedform Gemini 2, Men’s Sneakers
product_meta.description: Muscle through that last mile in the Under Armour UA Speedform Gemini 2 running shoe!.
feature_bullets: Smooth, ultrasonic welded seaming with Bemis tape for next-to-skin support and comfort
Thin comfort tongue and slightly padded collar
Dual-layer midsole features Charged Cushioning of top of Micro G foam for an ideal blend of cushioned support and explosive responsiveness
ArchForm provides added support at the arch
